page.name: The Plot Thickens
page.description: Croft has appeared, time to visit the Cauldron Sisters and see what's new!

page.name: Mint Cream Slasher I
page.description: Carved from the walls of Akaz's lab, this enchanted blade is not only sharp, but tastes good too! Just make sure not to nibble too much at once.
